Summary: , I noticed a bright light in sky outside window , went to tell brother came back and it was joined by a 2nd then a 3rd
divs: Sighting DetailsAt about 5:30pm on the 25th Nov 2011, I was looking out of my bedroom window over Southampton Valley , it was full dark outside and I noticed a bright orange light in the sky not moving but very intense over the Bitterne area of Southampton, I then went to get my brother to have a look at it , when we got back in I noticed another VERY bright red couloured light fly upwarards under the first at a very high speed and then slow under it so now there was 2 bright lights in the sky , I noticed as it slowed it changed coulor and intensity to an orange red , by now we were quite amazed as these clerly were not normal aircraft so we rush to find our digital camera and when we got back in the bedroom there were now 3 of the lights all oranage red bright hues in a large triangle formation the bottom 2 lights seemed to be moving to right and the top changed alitiude somewhat as we observed them after about 10 mins all 3 of the lights dissapeared the last to go being the bottom light we managed to take 2 photos but they didnt show anything due to probably the street and house lights below .The most remarkable thing was the speed at which the light came upwars under the first and the intensity of the light , they cannot have been chinese lanterns or firworks as these lights changed postion AND alitude and at times were extreemly brilliant.
trends: There have been 20 other sightings in Southampton
There were no other sightings in Southampton on or around November 25th 2011
